document.discussion_title: Pastor in Whole Foods cake controversy absent for Sunday service
document.topic_text: Pastor in Whole Foods cake controversy absent for Sunday service American-Statesman Monday 25th April, 2016 who targeted Whole Foods Market with controversial, viral allegations that backfired last week didn't hold its usual services today.Jordan Brown, who said he pastors a small group, the Church of Open Doors, didn't have their usual meeting out of his East Austin apartment complex Sunday.Since Jan. 17, the group has held about a dozen Sunday noon meetings in the "Social Hub" room at the AMLI South Shore apartment complex at 1620 East Riverside Drive,...
document.post: Pastor in Whole Foods cake controversy absent for Sunday service American-Statesman Monday 25th April, 2016 who targeted Whole Foods Market with controversial, viral allegations that backfired last week didn't hold its usual services today.Jordan Brown, who said he pastors a small group, the Church of Open Doors, didn't have their usual meeting out of his East Austin apartment complex Sunday.Since Jan. 17, the group has held about a dozen Sunday noon meetings in the "Social Hub" room at the AMLI South Shore apartment complex at 1620 East Riverside Drive,...
